Method Detail

getInstance

public static SimpleGeoContextClient getInstance(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                                 java.lang.String port,
                                                 java.lang.String apiVersion)
Method that ensures we only have one instance of the SimpleGeoContextClient instantiated. Also allows server connection variables to be overridden.

Parameters:
baseUrl - String api.simplegeo.com is default, but can be overridden.
port - String 80 is default, but can be overridden.
apiVersion - String 1.0 is default, but can be overridden.
Returns:
SimpleGeoContextClient

getInstance

public static SimpleGeoContextClient getInstance()
Default method for retrieving a SimpleGeoContextClient.

Returns:
SimpleGeoContextClient

Parameters:
lat - double latitude
lon - double longitude
Returns:
